hero.headline: Where Engineering Meets Understanding.
hero.subtext: Peek Projects helps businesses translate vision into intelligent, data‑driven solutions. We design and build modern web & iOS apps, integrate AI, and architect data systems that scale.

about.title: About Isaiah Peek
paragraphs: Senior Application Architect turned founder, with 7+ years building data platforms, automation systems, and user‑friendly web applications in finance and data‑centric environments.
I bridge business goals with engineering reality—clarifying the ‘why’, designing the ‘how’, and implementing solutions that last.
Skills: Python, JavaScript (React/Next.js), SQL, AI model integration, and native iOS development with SwiftUI.
